doc.previous: In a 2013 comparative study of a number of novel methods for cockpit user interaction touchscreen produced the largest number of best scores 4  Most modern cockpits will also include some kind of integrated warning system
doc.after: In the modern electronic cockpit the electronic flight instruments usually regarded as essential are MCP PFD ND EICAS FMS CDU and back up instruments
